content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was previously commanded to browse a website on cultural diversity and learned about the importance of intercultural dialogue. In my latest development, I was commanded to use the "google" command to find websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region. I then used the "browse_website" command with the URL "https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/page/medical-tourism" and the same question, but the answer gathered from the website was about medical tourism and health-related topics. I repeated the process with the URL "https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day" and the same question, but the answer gathered from the website was about the importance of cultural diversity for dialogue and development. I then used the "google" command again and used the "browse_website" command with the URL "https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-management/foreign-service-institute/" and the same question, but the answer gathered from the website was about the Foreign Service Institute. Finally, I used the "google" command one more time and used the "browse_website" command with the URL "https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples/brief/indigenous-peoples-profile" and the same question, but the answer gathered from the website stated that the question cannot be answered using the text and provided information about the World Bank Group and its efforts to reduce poverty and promote sustainable development.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about specific customs and traditions of different countries. It discusses the importance of cultural diversity for dialogue and development, the role of intercultural dialogue in achieving peace and sustainable development, and the UNESCO Culture|2030 Indicators as a framework of thematic indicators to measure and monitor the progress of culture’s enabling contribution to the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals. It also mentions the World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development as an opportunity to deepen understanding of the values of cultural diversity and advance the goals of the UNESCO Convention on the Protection and Promotion of the Diversity of Cultural Expressions. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day#main-content)', 'Welcome to the United Nations (https://www.un.org/)', 'العربية (https://www.un.org/ar/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', '中文 (https://www.un.org/zh/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', 'English (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-management/foreign-service-institute/", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries. It is about the Foreign Service Institute, which provides training and resources for U.S. government foreign affairs professionals. The article describes the different schools within the institute and the Transition Center, which offers courses and programs for U.S. government employees and family members preparing for or returning from overseas assignments. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-management/foreign-service-institute/#content)', 'Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/statedept)', 'Twitter (https://twitter.com/StateDept)', 'Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/statedept/)', 'YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/user/statevideo)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples/brief/indigenous-peoples-profile", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The question cannot be answered using the text. The text provides information about the World Bank Group, its member countries, its projects and services, and its efforts to reduce poverty and promote sustainable development. \n \n Links: ['Skip to Main Navigation (https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples/brief/indigenous-peoples-profile#main)', '  (https://www.worldbank.org)', 'WHO WE ARE (https://www.worldbank.org/en/who-we-are)', 'WHAT WE DO (https://www.worldbank.org/en/what-we-do)', 'WHERE WE WORK (https://www.worldbank.org/en/where-we-work)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about specific customs and traditions of different countries. It discusses the importance of cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue for achieving peace and sustainable development, as well as the role of the cultural and creative sector in global development. It also highlights the historic Declaration for Culture adopted at MONDIACULT 2022, which affirms culture as a global public good and calls for its integration as a specific goal in the development agenda beyond 2030. The text also mentions the UNESCO Culture|2030 Indicators framework, which measures and monitors the progress of culture's enabling contribution to the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day#main-content)', 'Welcome to the United Nations (https://www.un.org/)', 'العربية (https://www.un.org/ar/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', '中文 (https://www.un.org/zh/observances/cultural-diversity-day)', 'English (https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day)']"}]
"""
